hero.title: Hi, I'm Franco
hero.description: With more than 3 years of experience, I help startups and teams launch reliable platforms that adapt to business growth.

about.title: About me
about.personalStory: I'm a 27-year-old software developer who started working professionally in 2022, based in Amsterdam.
about.newChapter: Currently focused on developing scalable web applications with a strong emphasis on clean and maintainable code.
about.dedication: I care deeply about clarity, performance, and creating consistent, user-friendly designs.
about.interests: I'm especially interested in digital product design and always looking for ways to keep learning and improving.

aboutPage.buttonText: Would you like to know more about me?
